hooks.command: if [[ "$FILE_PATH" == *.rb ]] && command -v bundle &>/dev/null && bundle show rubocop &>/dev/null; then bundle exec rubocop -A "$FILE_PATH" 2>&1 || true; fi
if [[ "$FILE_PATH" =~ \.(js|jsx|ts|tsx)$ ]] && command -v yarn &>/dev/null && yarn eslint --version &>/dev/null; then yarn eslint --fix "$FILE_PATH" 2>&1 || true; fi
